name: GIVE THEM HELL
description:
You probably don't want those spiders to destroy your top secret military bunkers, but they're coming to do just that anyway. Just give them hell. And try not to die.

By me: SoundsOfTheWild AKA Zakary Wild

All code and music created within the 48 hour window. Sprites courtesy of Hippo of the Unity Asset Store, available at https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/armored-soldiers-and-monsters-2d-top-down-133669

(Note that animations were rigged within the time period and were not part of the asset package)
